verbose_text: For measurements of FliC levels, density of cell culture was adjusted to OD 600 = 1, and extracellular FliC filaments were sheared by Precellys homogenizer (Bertin Technologies) at 4,500 rpm for 20 s. Afterward, bacterial cells were collected by centrifugation (13,000 rpm for 1 min) at 4degreesC.
